name: Gaia
description: Gaia (Greek: Γαῖα) is the Primordial Goddess of the Earth, mother of the Titans and the grandmother/great-grandmother of the Olympian Gods. She is the narrator of the series, the deuteragonist of God of War II, and the secondary antagonist of God of War III.

biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Stabbed in the heart by Kratos with the Blade of Olympus)
